component.name: AtmosChemAndAerosols
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosChemAndAerosols required

component.name: AtmChemAerosKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemAerosKeyProperties required

parameter.name: ChemSchemeScope
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ChemSchemeScope required

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Decription of the basic approximations made in the AtmosphericChemistry and Aerosols model.

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ListOfPrognosticVariables required

value.name: 3D size bins or modes for aerosol compounds

parameter.name: NumberOfTracers
parameter.definition: Number of tracers (must be the sum of the two above: number of 3D mixing ratio + number of 3D size bins).

component.name: AtmChemAerosSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemAerosSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfig required

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the atmospheric chemistry and aerosols model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for atmospheric chemistry and aerosols.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Definition of property name NumberOfLevels required

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinateSystem
parameter.definition: Definition of property name VerticalCoordinateSystem required

constraint.name: if VerticalCoordinateSystem is not "hybrid sigma pressure"

parameter.name: LevelsValues
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LevelsValues required

parameter.name: LevelsA-Values
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LevelsA-Values required

parameter.name: LevelsB-Values
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LevelsB-Values required

component.name: AtmChemAerosTimeStepping
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemAerosTimeStepping required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

parameter.name: AdvectionTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for chemical species advection.

parameter.name: PhysicalTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for physics and chemistry.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Definition of property name TimeStep required

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SchemeType required

parameter.name: FamilyApproach
parameter.definition: Definition of property name FamilyApproach required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

constraint.name: if Method is "specific time stepping (operator splitting)"

parameter.name: AdvectionTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for aerosols advection.

parameter.name: PhysicalTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for aerosols physics.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Definition of property name TimeStep required

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SchemeType required

parameter.name: FamilyApproach
parameter.definition: Definition of property name FamilyApproach required

parameter.name: 3D-Variables
parameter.definition: Definition of property name 3D-Variables required

parameter.name: 2D-Variables
parameter.definition: Definition of property name 2D-Variables required

parameter.name: Frequency
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Frequency required

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: list of species emitted by aircrafts.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required
